title: usrzero01
author: usrzero01
content: IS there a list or can people post legit companies they have dealt with on this forum?I was looking to purchase from Shenzhen Jingang Zhuoyue Technology Co., Ltd. linked to ydminer.com , Maria email is fareast008@ydminer.com. searched names of company, reviews, crypto address lookup, etc....https://ydminer.en.alibaba.com/?spm=a2700.9014153.0.0.4f093e5fqAHvZNThere are some good and bad reviews but not enough to green light my purchase. Says they been around 11yrs, seems to be a lack of reviews for doing business that long, and lack of any recent reviews.Anyone have history with this company?I dealt with a few or companies, but like to only deal with bigger companies apexto and letine, but letine sent me s 19 pro, instead of s19j pro, sales person just kept saying they would fix it some how but we couldnt agree on a resolution, so i just stopped using them.Thanks.

comments.author: alani123
comments.body: https://who.is/whois/ydminer.com shows the domain was registered in 2018. Seems like this store on Alibababa is selling GPUs though? If you're looking to buy GPUs, no reason to import them from China imho. If you're interested in ASIC mining equipment these days you can buy from BITMAIN directly as they have stock on site. You'll still have to pay customs if you buy from a Chinese reseller so I don't see the reason to take the risk.

comments.author: usrzero01
comments.body: I wanted to purchase asic ice river miners.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: usrzero01 on November 26, 2023, 01:23:25 AMI wanted to purchase asic ice river miners. too late as YouTube influencers told everyone to buy this one https://www.iceriver.io/product/iceriver-ks0-pro/these are all gone.you would be lucky to find them at 600 each.btw this is an alt coin question it belongs here.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=160.0

comments.author: usrzero01
comments.body: Wanted to know is this company selling legit hardware or not and has anyone dealt with them, dont care what type of miner it was, ice river, antminer, whatsminer, anyminers.  Thanks.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.created_time: November 27, 2023, 04:45:25 PMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 06:31:02 PM by NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: usrzero01 on November 27, 2023, 04:20:24 PMWanted to know is this company selling legit hardware or not and has anyone dealt with them, dont care what type of miner it was, ice river, antminer, whatsminer, anyminers.  Thanks. You SHOULD care because not all crypto coins are the same and they all have different value. Considering where you've posted, you should be looking for Bitcoin miners. Anything else is an altcoin aka crapcoin miner and questions about them belong in the altcoin areas, not here.That said, the only safe way to buy a miner is direct from the manufacturer or an Authorized reseller which will be listed on the manufacturers website - period.Any other source risks being scammed or at best not having a warranty because the reseller is not an authorized one.

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: usrzero01 on November 26, 2023, 12:44:45 AMIS there a list or can people post legit companies they have dealt with on this forum?You can always trust our Canaan Shop Brand new with 360 days warranty.
